Finally a sound fix!! For all those who have image but no sound!
At least that is in my case. After finishing the game in no sound, and 4 days of googling and testing!

The game does not output to your main sound device!
So if you got a second sound device in Dxdiag, usually a modem device, you must get rid of it!
Only one sound tab and it must not being emulated. So increase the hardware acceleration.

Disable your modem device in hardware management (better to remove it physically, like I did!), and remove any drivers from the configuration panel -> phone and modem options!

Game is way better with sound! With 5.1 surround, you can even locate your enemies just by turning!!!

Hopefully will help somebody out there.
